headline: Sherwin-Williams Declares Dividend of $0.79 per Common Share
summary: The Board of Directors of The Sherwin-Williams Company (NYSE: SHW) today announced a regular quarterly dividend of $0.79 per common share payable on September 5, 2025, to shareholders of record on August 15, 2025.
